text: Mukhammad - Poslannik Allakha. Te, kotoryye vmeste s nim, surovy k neveruyushchim i milostivy mezhdu soboy. Ty vidish', kak oni klanyayutsya i padayut nits, stremyas' k milosti ot Allakha i dovol'stvu. Ikh priznakom yavlyayutsya sledy ot zemnykh poklonov na ikh litsakh. Tak oni predstavleny v Taurate (Tore). V Indzhile (Yevangelii) zhe oni predstavleny posevom, na kotorom vyros rostok. On ukrepil yego, i tot stal tolstym i vypryamilsya na svoyem steble, voskhishchaya seyateley. Allakh privel etu pritchu dlya togo, chtoby privesti imi v yarost' neveruyushchikh. Allakh obeshchal tem iz nikh, kotoryye uverovali i sovershali pravednyye deyaniya, proshcheniye i velikuyu nagradu
